msg.msgText: EnableHA Specify if High Availability is enabled. Options:True,False Default:False Group Group is used to automatically configure appliances to pair with each other. The value must be the same on both appliances. The maximum length of this value is 128 characters. When this value is set, replication and discovery addresses are not required. StartupMode Specify the mode that the node starts in. Options:AutoDetect,StandAlone, Default:AutoDetect PreferredPrimary Specify whether this node is the preferred primary. Options:True,False Default:False RemoteDiscoveryNIC Specify the IP address of the NIC that is used for HA discovery on the remote node in the HA pair. LocalDiscoveryNIC Specify the IP address of the NIC that is used for HA discovery on the local node in the HA pair. LocalReplicationNIC Specify the IP address of the NIC that is used for HA replication on the local node in the HA pair. DiscoveryTimeout Specify the time in seconds within which an appliance that is started in auto-detect mode must connect to the other appliance in the HA pair. Options:10-2147483647 Default:600 HeartbeatTimeout Specify the time in seconds within which an appliance must determine whether the other appliance in the HA pair has failed. Options:1-2147483647 Default:10
